rooms.description: A welcoming space with Bohemian decor featuring local handcrafted tiles and natural light.
Spacious open-plan living area with a mix of modern and Bohemian furnishings, large windows to ensure Vastu compliance by allowing natural light from the east.
Adjacent open dining space integrated with the living area, featuring an elongated table and decor that complements local aesthetics.
Open kitchen design with modern appliances integrated seamlessly into the living area; designed keeping Vastu guidelines in mind by positioning cooking zone towards the south.
A private retreat featuring Bohemian decor with a focus on natural elements and light; aligned according to Vastu principles for relaxation.
A cozy guest bedroom that offers ample space with Bohemian touches while observing local building norms and optimal Vastu flow.

openings.description: Main entrance designed for both aesthetic appeal and functional access, aligned with local architectural style.
Large window to bring natural light in accordance with Vastu principles; contributes to the Bohemian ambiance.
